meanings.definition: The position or authority of a king.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the young prince dreamed of achieving kinghood one day.
meanings.sent2: The king's wise decisions were a result of his long-held kinghood.
meanings.sent3: The talking animals in the fairy tale decided to hold a competition for the title of kinghood.
meanings.sent4: The kinghood of the CEO in the company was evident in his confident leadership style.
meanings.sent5: The grand ceremony marked the official passing of the kinghood to the prince.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a king.
meanings.sent1: The kingdom celebrated the new kinghood with a lavish banquet.
meanings.sent2: The kinghood of the ruler was evident in the way he carried himself with dignity.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous jester joked that he was next in line for the kinghood.
meanings.sent4: The kinghood of the mountain peak was undisputed among the surrounding hills.
meanings.sent5: The royal crown symbolized the ultimate achievement of kinghood.
